clinical_study.brief_title: Potential Diagnostic and Prognostic Value of microRNAs for the Patients of Sepsis-induced Myocardial Injury
clinical_study.official_title: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

lead_sponsor.agency: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

clinical_study.source: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the potential diagnostic and prognosis value of circulating microRNAs compared with cTnI for the patients of sepsis-induced myocardial injury at the emergency department (ED) and intensive care unit (ICU).

primary_outcome.measure: Diagnostic value of microRNAs evaluate by qPCR in patients of sepsis-induced myocardial injury

secondary_outcome.measure: Prognostic value of microRNAs in patients of sepsis-induced myocardial injury

arm_group.description: Patients admitted to the hospital with the diagnosis of Sepsis-induced myocardial injury
Patients admitted to the hospital without the diagnosis of Sepsis-induced myocardial injury
